short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: providing detailed insights into website design elements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed for web developers and UI/UX testers, providing detailed insights into website design elements. It analyzes and displays the colors used (background, text, borders), all image assets on the page, and font details (size, line height, font family). This tool aims to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of web development and UI/UX testing processes.
